resume.work: Currently attending a bootcamp in web development

resume.place: Cape Academy of Mathematics, Science and Technology

testimonials.name: Cody Kader - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: Amy works well in both teamwork and individual settings. She has strong skills in HTML, CSS and Javascript and she's always willingly to help her peers.

testimonials.name: Abdoelmaalik Samaai - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: She is a kind-hearted, and caring person. She is focused on her goals and has a strong work ethic. She is good with problem-solving and persistently seeks innovative solutions. Amy is also not afraid to ask for advice when needed and consistently strives for self improvement.

testimonials.name: Kgodisho Lebopa - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: I have been impressed by Amy's commitment to learning and growing as a coder. She has a natural talent for problem-solving and has already demonstrated proficiency in the work she does. I highly recommend Amy to any organization seeking a motivated developer.

testimonials.name: Kamvelihle Sikalana - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is proficient in HTML, CSS and JavaScript. She is reliable and a team player in group related projects, she has a hunger to learn more

testimonials.name: Jason Viljoen - Peer
testimonials.testimonial: For the 6 months that I have worked with Amy, she has shown a lot of promise in the work place and class setup. Always lending a helping hand where needed, even having the class lecturer asking her for her help and insight. A very bright individual and ready to take on any task put in front of her.

testimonials.name: Seth Kallis - Mentor
testimonials.testimonial: Amy is dedicated, hard working and a team player. She works well with her peers and performs well on her projects. She has a good understanding of web development and would be a valuable addition to any team that is lucky enough to have her.
